name: Mitigation Playbook for RDP Unauthorized Access Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker exploited weak credentials to gain unauthorized access to a critical server via Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP) and attempted data exfiltration.

action--e1eae9c0-04f8-4e01-9b83-3a1ea633.name: Revoke RDP access from the compromised account
action--e1eae9c0-04f8-4e01-9b83-3a1ea633.description: Deleting the user account that was used in the attack.

action--b3d95b60-9c94-4095-bfdf-da12a123.name: Monitor network traffic for unusual outbound connections
action--b3d95b60-9c94-4095-bfdf-da12a123.description: Setting up a tcpdump command to monitor for suspicious traffic every 5 minutes.

action--d5b79c4c-cd5e-4e27-99e4-ebd3f0db.name: Initiate a full security audit on the affected server
action--d5b79c4c-cd5e-4e27-99e4-ebd3f0db.description: Running a security audit on server-01 and saving the report.
